Block as many websites as you want permanently, on a schedule, or on a whitelist. 

Create a focus group to block all websites EXCEPT the ones in the focus group list. 

Future features
- Preventing user from unblocking websites by making them answer a bunch of math questions first. 
- When user tries to uninstall extension, guilt trip users by opening a page that absolutely roasts them.
- Have a custom page or quote users can redirect to.


Patch Notes
- v1.0.1: made the app actually work
- v1.0.2: fixed weird flexbox issue with add block site schedule UI
